name: Brain Sync AI
introduction: Web application that uses local AI to create personalized learning paths, flashcards, and quizzes for users.
goals: This project is designed as a personal learning initiative with the following goals: Deepen knowledge in Artificial Intelligence with a particular focus on developing localized solutions | Learn frontend development with React | Explore backend development using Python and Flask.

name: EC Portfolio
introduction: Website to showcase a photographer's work with creative coding.
goals: The goal for this project was to create an interactive website while deepening my knowledge of modern frontend tools and techniques : Enhance frontend development skills using Nuxt.js | Explore smooth scrolling techniques with Lenis | Implement dynamic animations with GSAP to create an engaging user experience | Get started with WebGL and Three.js to explore 3D web graphics.

name: Bakery in DC
introduction: Designed and implemented a compliance traceability system for an industrial baking company.
goals: Led the end-to-end development of a cost-effective traceability system, from gathering client requirements to training end users. The solution integrated seamlessly with the client’s existing Google-based workflows, featuring custom forms, logs, and dashboards. It improved product traceability speed by 60% while staying within budget.

name: Meritis
introduction: Work as a Software Engineer for an IT consulting firm
goals: Contributed to the architecture and development of scalable microservices, creating Dockerized connectors to integrate HR data across 10 platforms. | Designed and implemented CI/CD pipelines in Azure DevOps to automate the detection of vulnerabilities in 100% of packages and reduce code smells by 40%. | Redesigned an interview management application leading the migration from Vue.js V2 to V3 for improved performance and maintainability. | Built a monitoring system using Application Insights (Azure) that reduced issue resolution times by 70% by providing real time alerts and actionable data.

name: Dawan
introduction: Work as a Software Developer for an IT consulting firm
goals: Designed and developed a planning application (Java | Vue.js) for a training center, reducing scheduling conflicts by 30% and enabling Sales and HR teams to manage trainers’ schedules and maintain course catalogs effectively. | Created an Android application (Java) for non-admin users, extending the planning tool’s functionality to mobile devices. | Automated the collection of market data with Selenium to improve competitive analysis (Java | Angular).

name: Origins Track
introduction: Transparent and secure food traceability with a blockchain platform.
goals: The 'OriginsTrack' project aims to create a blockchain platform that will allow consumers to trace the provenance of their food back to its source.
